biotools.summary: A tool for automatic comparing and searching for RNA tertiary motifs using secondary structural alignment. It takes into consideration the isosteric (both canonical and non-canonical) base-pairs and multi-pairings in RNA tertiary motifs.

bioschemas.name: RNAMotifScan
bioschemas.summary: A tool for automatic comparing and searching for RNA tertiary motifs using secondary structural alignment. It takes into consideration the isosteric (both canonical and non-canonical) base-pairs and multi-pairings in RNA tertiary motifs.
